reviewText:
I did not buy these DVD's through Amazon.

Mr. Leftwich is a superb fiddler, great performer, and an above average teacher.  These two videos will compliment any Old Time fiddler's learning curve.  Lessons and tunes are presented in logical order, and Brad's teaching style is just plain wonderful.

I bought my copies from another source because of a considerably lower price than what is charged here.
you must be able to play some fiddle if not this dvd is not for you! great songs-great step by step dvd- well worth the money!!

Nice organization and choice of songs for steady progression of skills.  My only suggestion for improvement would be for Brad to teach the notes of each song by playing a few bars, then repeating them 2 or 3 times so the viewer can play along without having to rewind so much.
